dsOverview.title: ECMWF TOGA Analyses for COARE, 6-hourly, 1992Nov15-1993Feb15

summary.p: A special set of fields for the TOGA COARE region during 15 Nov 1992-15 Feb 1993. Fields consist of initialized analyses and short range forecasts from reruns of the T106L31 ECMWF model. Use of this data is restricted to COARE scientists only.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: ECMWF > European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

access.p: We are allowed to distribute this data to US scientists, scientists visiting US organizations, and Canadian scientists affiliated with UCAR member organizations only.

usage.p: This data must not be used for commercial purposes. ECMWF must be given credit in any publications in which this data is used.

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Precipitation > Precipitation Amount
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Winds > Surface Winds
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Water Vapor > Dew Point Temperature
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Surface Air Temperature
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Pressure > Surface Pressure
dsOverview.project: TOGA COARE > TOGA Coupled Ocean Atmosphere Response Experiment
